FertilizeAction - Class in game.actions
Special Action for fertilizing an unripe Crop to decrease the time left to ripe.
FertilizeAction(Ground) - Constructor for class game.actions.FertilizeAction
Create a FertilizeAction object using a Ground which specifies an unripe Crop that is to be fertilized.
FertilizeBehaviour - Class in game.behaviours
A class that generates a FertilizeAction if the current Actor is standing on an unripe Crop to fertilize it.
FertilizeBehaviour() - Constructor for class game.behaviours.FertilizeBehaviour
 
FireRangedWeaponAction - Class in game.actions
Special Action that allows Actor to fire ranged weapon.
FireRangedWeaponAction(Item, Item) - Constructor for class game.actions.FireRangedWeaponAction
Create a FireRangedWeaponAction object using an item that specifies the ranged weapon and an item which specifies the ammunition.
FireShotgunAction - Class in game.actions
Special Action that allows Actor to fire shotgun towards the direction chosen.
FireShotgunAction(String, String, int) - Constructor for class game.actions.FireShotgunAction
Create a FireShotgunAction object using a String that specifies the direction where the shotgun is fired towards, a String that specifies the key used in the menu and an integer that specifies the damage points of the target.
